name: Sword Hopper (PlainCaribou)
description:
A short precision platformer inspired by some of my favorites.Should take 10-20 minutes to finish depending on your familiarity of platformers.

Design, code, graphics and music done by @PlainCaribou.

CONTROLS:

  • Movement: A & D or Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Spacebar
  • Confirm: Enter
  • Sword Slash:  H

Controller is partially supported.

TIPS:

  • Hold Jump to jump longer
  • Hold a direction during a jump to jump further

This is my first game so any feedback is appreciated!
